column5: If you have ever stayed at Gold Pines on Lac Suel your opnions would be greatly appreciated. I am considering staying their in the near future. Thanks!
A large group of us were there last year the last week in July and we were very satisfied with the cottage and will be there again on July 24 this year. Very satisfied with the camp.

been going there for 25 years great people excelent accomadations pete krista helen and bill are as nice of people as you will meet. Offer everything at camp so don't need to go in town for anything. just my 2 cents A Bad Day Fishing is Better than the Best Day at Work Best Reguards Walleye_Slayer

I would like to get some information on this resort..Do they have a website or can I get a brochere mailed to me..I am looking for a new place to stay for next June. If you have a phone number of the resort I could give them a call. THANKS IN ADVANCE!!
Thanks for your feed back. The phone # for Gold Pines is 1-800-977-0041
